site.name: Kalinga Odyssey
site.description: Discover the timeless heritage, vibrant culture, and natural beauty of Odisha - the land of Lord Jagannath

temples.name: Jagannath Temple
temples.description: A 12th-century temple, one of the Char Dham, home to Lord Jagannath, Balabhadra, and Subhadra.

temples.name: Lingaraj Temple
temples.description: The largest temple in Bhubaneswar, dedicated to Lord Shiva, built in the 11th century.

temples.name: Sun Temple, Konark
temples.description: A 13th-century UNESCO World Heritage site, an architectural marvel shaped like a massive chariot.

temples.name: Mukteswara Temple
temples.description: A 10th-century Hindu temple dedicated to Shiva, known for its exquisite stone archway and detailed carvings.

temples.name: Udayagiri & Khandagiri Caves
temples.description: Partly natural and partly artificial caves of archaeological, historical and religious importance.

temples.name: Dhauli Giri Hills
temples.description: A hill on the banks of the river Daya, with a dazzling white peace pagoda, where Emperor Ashoka's change of heart occurred.

temples.name: Diamond Triangle
temples.description: The Buddhist complex of Ratnagiri, Udayagiri, and Lalitgiri, forming a 'Diamond Triangle' of monasteries and stupas.

temples.name: Chausath Yogini Temple
temples.description: A 9th-century tantric temple dedicated to the 64 Yoginis, unique for its circular, open-air structure.

temples.name: Barabati Fort
temples.description: A 13th-century fort from the Ganga dynasty. Its ruins, moat, and gate offer a glimpse into its past glory.

temples.name: Sisupalgarh Fort
temples.description: The ruined fortification of an ancient capital of Kalinga, one of India's best-preserved early historic fortifications.

temples.name: Rajarani Temple
temples.description: Famous for its intricate and erotic sculptures and unique stone composition, built in the 11th century.

crafts.name: Pattachitra
crafts.description: Traditional scroll painting with intricate details, depicting mythological stories and Lord Jagannath.

crafts.name: Applique Work
crafts.description: Vibrant decorative fabric work using cut-out patterns sewn onto another cloth.

crafts.name: Silver Filigree
crafts.description: Delicate silver wire art creating intricate jewelry and decorative items.

crafts.name: Stone Carving
crafts.description: Ancient art of sculpting temples and deities from stone.

foods.name: Pakhala Bhata
foods.description: Fermented rice water - the perfect summer dish and soul food of Odisha.

foods.name: Dalma
foods.description: A staple dish of dal cooked with vegetables and tempered with ghee and spices.

foods.name: Chhena Poda
foods.description: The famous baked cottage cheese dessert with a crust of caramelized sugar.

foods.name: Rasogolla
foods.description: Spongy cottage cheese balls in sugar syrup - a dessert with a GI tag for Odisha.

governance.name: Subhadra Yojana
governance.description: A financial assistance scheme providing ₹10,000 per year for women aged 21-60.

governance.name: KALIA Scheme
governance.description: Provides financial support of ₹10,000 per season to small and marginal farmers.

industries.name: Mining Industry
industries.description: Rich in iron ore, bauxite, coal, and manganese, making it a major revenue source with global exports.

industries.name: IT & Smart City
industries.description: Bhubaneswar is a designated Smart City and a growing hub for IT and tech innovation.
